channel.title: Linux on Taha Draidia
channel.description: Recent content in Linux on Taha Draidia

item.title: Mr Robot Vulnhub Challenge Walkthrough
item.description: I had some extra time this weekend so I decided to play Mr Robot hacking challenge. I heard a lot about that challenge but I didn’t have time to hack it. Now was the time. I downloaded the virtual machine image from vulnhub, fired up virtulbox, started kali linux vm. Enumeration time, I always start with port scanning to see what services are running but to do so I need to find the machine’s IP first.
